collection:
# Privacy Notice for Jarvis Project This privacy notice provides information
about the collection, use, and disclosure of personal and project data within
the Jarvis Project.

## Data Collection The Jarvis Project is committed
to minimal data collection, emphasizing user privacy and data security.

Our
system only collects network-related data essential for the efficient
operation and communication within the project.

This includes, but is not
limited to, network traffic data, connection times, and system diagnostics.

The collected data is strictly limited to what is necessary for
maintaining the functionality and performance of the Jarvis Project.
sharing:
# Privacy Notice for Jarvis Project This privacy notice provides information
about the collection, use, and disclosure of personal and project data within
the Jarvis Project.

## Data Disclosure Personal and project data will not be
disclosed to third parties except as required by law or necessary for the
project's functionality and support.
